markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Insect Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=327) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 136 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures. Add the forms in [_insect form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=163) to your [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) list. Whenever you use _wild shape_ to polymorph into the non-flying insect form listed in [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217), the duration is 24 hours instead of 10 minutes.
name: Insect Shape

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Insect Shape Source Core Rulebook pg. 136 4.0 Prerequisites Wild Shape --- Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures. Add the forms in insect form to your wild shape list. Whenever you use wild shape to polymorph into the non-flying insect form listed in pest form , the duration is 24 hours instead of 10 minutes.
